sentence.Network_en: The rolls of distant thunder were growing more ominous.
sentence.Network_cn: 远处隆隆的雷声听着愈发惊心，要变天了。

sentence.Network_en: It's an ominous development that may bode ill for the Russian parliament.
sentence.Network_cn: 进展很不顺利，对俄罗斯议会来说这可能是个坏兆头。

sentence.Network_en: This ominous warning soon proved prophetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个不祥的警告很快证明是有预见性的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: P开头的英语单词 ... 9.pant：n. & v. 喘气，喘息 4.ominous：a. 预兆的，不祥的 5.omniscient：a. 无所不知的.
P开头的英语单词 ... 9.pant：n. & v. 喘气，喘息 4.ominous：a. 预兆的，不祥的 5.omniscient：a. 无所不知的.
松松：3天背完GR... ... grave n. 墓穴, 坟墓 ominous adj. 预兆的, 恶兆的, 不吉利的 18。 grief n. 悲痛, 伤心事, 不幸, 忧伤 19。.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... omen 预兆 ominous 不吉利的 omission 省略.

list.abs: 禁忌语包括脏话（obscene），粗俗的话（vulgar），不吉利的话（ominous words）和触犯神灵的话（profane）。多数情况下，诸如…
She often has an ominous presentiment ., 她时时有一种不祥的预感.
there is a widespread testimony that this ominous fact is due to inherent biological defects in the crowded life of cities .有一个普遍的证据可以说明这种不吉利的事实归咎于城市拥挤生活中的固有的生态缺陷。
the onset of dyspnea in heart disease usually signifies ominous prognosis .心脏病患者出现呼吸困难通常提示预后不良。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin ominosus, from omen, omin- 'omen'

entry.tran: 不祥的；恶兆的；不吉利的
entry.def: If you describe something as ominous, you mean that it worries you because it makes you think that something unpleasant is going to happen.

example.ex: There was an ominous silence at the other end of the phone...
example.tran: 电话那头出现了不祥的沉默。

example.ex: The rolls of distant thunder were growing more ominous.
example.tran: 远处隆隆的雷声听着愈发惊心，要变天了。

means.word_mean: 1. threatening or foreshadowing evil or tragic developments;

sentences.sentence: "my words with inauspicious thunderings shook heaven"- P.B.Shelley
"a by-election at a time highly unpropitious for the Government"

auth_sentence.content: It is an ominous warning of what may follow.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is an ominous warning of what may follow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is an ominous warning of what may follow.

auth_sentence.content: These were ominous signs of the battle to come.
auth_sentence.res_content: These were ominous signs of the battle to come.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These were ominous signs of the battle to come.

auth_sentence.content: Lately, however, his visits have turned ominous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lately, however, his visits have turned ominous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lately, however, his visits have turned ominous.

sentences.en: Those black clouds look ominous for our picnic.
sentences.cn: 那些乌云对我们的野餐来说是个不祥之兆。
